description: This file is a shell script for handling GRE tunnel setup and hotspot configuration, including setting system parameters, creating network interfaces, and configuring iptables rules.

methods.name: init_snooper_sysevents
methods.description: Initializes snooper system events by enabling circuit and remote snooper.

methods.name: read_init_params
methods.description: Retrieves initial parameters for GRE and hotspot configuration from PSM database.

methods.name: create_tunnel
methods.description: Creates a GRE tunnel and configures network interfaces and bridges.

methods.name: init_keepalive_sysevents
methods.description: Initializes sys events for keepalive configuration.

methods.name: update_bridge_config
methods.description: Sets iptables rules for network traffic forwarding.

calls: ip link add gretap0 type gretap remote `sysevent get hotspotfd-tunnelEP` local ...
